title: Stock Futures Waver as Investors Mull ‘Stagflation’ Risks
sub_head: Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen is set to appear before the House Ways and Means Committee at 10 a.m. ET
body:
U.S. stock futures edged lower, putting indexes on course to extend a stretch of choppy trading, as investors considered a gloomy outlook for the global economy and awaited key data.
Futures tied to the S&P 500 slipped 0.5% Wednesday, while blue-chip Dow Jones Industrial Average futures weakened 0.5%. Technology-heavy Nasdaq-100 futures declined 0.4%.
